QuestData.Title: Guardians of the Plateau
QuestData.Description: The Elemental Plateau is sanctuary to the elemental spirits of Nagrand.$b$bThe greatest among the elementals on the plateau are the guardians; mighty elemental spirits that stand watch over their domain.$b$bThe guardians are pure and mighty spirits but a disturbance in the natural balance has caused them to grow unstable, corrupting the lesser elementals around them.$b$bIn order to restore balance to the plateau, the guardians must be destroyed. Only then will the cycle of rebirth begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the corrupted guardians atop the Elemental Plateau.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you cleansed the plateau of the corrupted guardians?
QuestData.RewardText: Each of the guardians you put to rest were once mighty and noble elemental spirits.$b$bIn time each shall be reborn anew through the cycle of rebirth, but Gordawg must be found and balance restored lest the plateau become unstable yet again.
